attributes.review: When I opened the app I was hesitant to put in my phone number (as I should have). The next day many spam callers were repeatedly calling me! If Trump has released this information, what's next??? My address??? I am absolutely terrified for my life!!! What else is Trump hiding from us????
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE-SHARED PERSONAL INFORMATION

attributes.review: THIS IS THE MOST TERRIBLE APP EVER!! My phone was glitching so bad and it caused it to shut off and I had to reboot it to start working again. Let’s not talk about how ✨u n c o m f y✨ this app makes me as well. It kills my battery so fast and I feel as if it is unlawfully taking data from my phone. TAKE THIS OFF THE APP STORE NOW !
attributes.title: bad app don’t get it

attributes.review: ✨💕🧚‍♂️if you decide to get this app you are basically supporting hitler 🙈🙈🙈 my poor phone almost got destroyed because of this app, not only does he take our right away this app also makes my battery go down. It’s disgusting don’t even try it out  💅
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: This app or should I say SCAM HACKED MY PHONE it took all my information and sent it to my ex husband that has been trying to hunt me down and kill me for years. I am currently hiding in my closet writing this review to warn other women about the dangers of this app I am scared for my li fdidjdhfhfhfhfhfbaloahendocyemsbs *dies cutely* 💀💀💀☠️
attributes.title: HACKED MY PHONE

attributes.review:
This is so disgusting and it almost made me die for the repulsiveness on this app why would you (apple)support such an app this app has killed so many’s insides I’m so upset and distraught about this app 😤 it needs to be taken down ASAP 🤬

~ yours truly GEN Z 🧚🏾‍♀️
attributes.title: This is so repulsive that Apple would support this app 🤬

attributes.review: So basically I was using the app and then I fell down my stairs and broke my leg apart from my stupidity oh using and app while I was walking down my stairs I also think it was the apps fault because I was trying to figure out what 3 year old design the dam app
attributes.title: This is hot garbage

attributes.review: When I downloaded this app it took all my information and started to delete my accounts on other platforms and it got access to my credit cards and started purchasing trump Merch!! PLEASE DO NOT make the same mistake I did, it cost me a lot, literally.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: the app is so hard to use and took over an hour to download, and i think my phone got a virus from it! of course i wanted to support trump but i can’t use this app at all, i’ll just have to support him from twitter i guess. on another note, bern ❤️
attributes.title: i HATE this app

attributes.review: Absolutely the worst app ever. When I opened the app it kept glitching. The app was slow and I could barely get to anything. Plus the layout is just plain confusing. I would give it zero stars but the App Store doesn’t allow it :/
attributes.title: Glitching

attributes.review:
I would NOT recommend. I opened the app and my tv started glitching and I saw Trumps face everywhere. I started getting scared and it traumatized me. My kitty was super scared and she ran off. Now my kitty’s gone and I can’t find her. It now feels like the end of the world. She was my only friend😭😭💔 DON’T DOWNLOAD APP.
Thank you(=
attributes.title: Oof😔💀🦋
